casebody.data:
Bevington, Appellant, v. Suburban-West Nurses Registry, Inc., Appellee.

[Cite as Bevington v. Suburban-West Nurses Registry, Inc. (1990), 49 Ohio St. 3d 83.]

(No. 89-85 Submitted January 23, 1990 Decided February 21, 1990.) Shapiro, Kendis & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Alan J. Shapiro, for appellant. Seeley, Savidge & Aussem Co., L.P.A., and Thomas M. Carolin, for appellee.

*84The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on authority of Bostic v. Connor (1988), 37 Ohio St. 3d 144, 524 N.E. 2d 881.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
